eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Gila, AZ; Arizona; Apache; Cochise; Graham; Greenlee; La Paz; Maricopa; Mohave; Navajo; Pima; Pinal; Santa Cruz; Yavapai; Yuma, AZ; at 01:39 AM ON DEC 28, 2025 Effective until 09:39 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. A SAFE Alert has been issued for Maricopa County.  Phoenix Police Department is looking for 68 year old Raymond Rey.  Raymond is a black male, 5 feet 7 inches tall, 134 pounds, with brown eyes and bald.  Raymond was last seen at 1950 hours on 12/27/25 in a manual wheelchair near the area of 37th Street and McDowell Road in Phoenix, Arizona.  He was last seen wearing a tan shirt with a black hoodie, light green sweatpants and a blue Navy hat.  Raymond suffers from a condition which can cause him to become confused and disoriented.  If you have seen Raymond, please contact the Phoenix Police Department at 602-534-2121 or call 911. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
